arlut.csd.ganymede.common
Class windowSizer

java.lang.Object
  arlut.csd.ganymede.common.windowSizer

public class windowSizer
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class handles saving and restoring window sizes for the Ganymede client, using the Java Preferences API that was introduced in Java 1.4.

windowSizer

Method Detail

saveSize

public void saveSize(javax.swing.JFrame window)
This method saves the given window's size and position in the system-dependent Java preferences store. This is not guaranteed to work, and may in fact be a no-op if no preferences store is available.

restoreSize

public boolean restoreSize(javax.swing.JFrame window)
This method retrieves the given window's size and position from the system-dependent Java preferences store. This is not guaranteed to work. If no preferences are found for the window's position and size, restoreSize() will return false and no actions will be performed on the window. If the preferences are found, the given window will be sized to match that saved in the preferences.

saveSize

public void saveSize(javax.swing.JDialog dialog)
This method saves the given dialog's size and position in the system-dependent Java preferences store. This is not guaranteed to work, and may in fact be a no-op if no preferences store is available.

restoreSize

public boolean restoreSize(javax.swing.JDialog dialog)
This method retrieves the given dialog's size and position from the system-dependent Java preferences store. This is not guaranteed to work. If no preferences are found for the dialog's position and size, restoreSize() will return false and no actions will be performed on the dialog. If the preferences are found, the given dialog will be sized to match that saved in the preferences.

saveLookAndFeel

public void saveLookAndFeel()
This method saves the selected look and feel to the system-dependent Java preferences store.

restoreLookAndFeel

public boolean restoreLookAndFeel()
This method looks up the look and feel selection stored in the system-dependent Java preferences store, and applies it to this application.
